page.title: 02CUNNINGHAME DISTRICT COUNCIL
page.content: The council building was constructed in 1973 and is situated in the commercial area of the D block.The council is the biggest employer in the area with 1300 employees. Decisions are made during council meetings (32 per week) about leisure,housing,health,finance,and future planning for the whole of the {Cunninghame}District.(North Ayrshire). Mrs Theresa Beattie leads the council and is called the{convener. } She was elected as the councillor for the town of Stevenston and was then elected to the higher office.The vice_ convenor is called Jack Carson. Irvine has a twin town in Sweden called{Udevalla}which has been visited by local schools but the link has not been as fruitful as had been hoped. Note that the Eglinton Trophy is held in the Council Chambers.
